MEMBER_TAB.ADD_WORKSPACE_MEMBER: Add workspace members with following roles:
MEMBER_TAB.TITLE: Members

TOOLTIPS.WORKSPACE_ROLE: The member's role of this workspace
TOOLTIPS.DEFAULT_WORKGROUP_ROLE: The member's default role of all workgroups inside this workspace

VERSION_VIEW: You are currently viewing the version of {{filename}}
VERSION_NAME_UPDATE: the version name has changed to {{filename}}

WORKGROUP_DRAG_DROP_BACKGROUND_MOBILE.TITLE: Upload your files
WORKGROUP_DRAG_DROP_BACKGROUND_MOBILE.COMMENT: Upload and add members, to collaborate with them.
WORKGROUP_DRAG_DROP_BACKGROUND_MOBILE.COMMENT_VERSION: Upload your file's versions and see your file history.

UPDATE_DEFAULT_WORKGROUPS_ROLE.TITLE: Edit default workgroup role
UPDATE_DEFAULT_WORKGROUPS_ROLE.MESSAGE: You are about to update member's default role to all workgroups inside the workspace {{workspaceName}}.
UPDATE_DEFAULT_WORKGROUPS_ROLE.ACTION: Override this role for all existing workgroups

SHARED_SPACE_TOOLTIPS.WORKSPACE: A Workspace contains only Workgroups, a Workspace will allow you to define a list of default members for all nested Workgroups with their default role (browse, create, etc)
SHARED_SPACE_TOOLTIPS.WORKGROUP: A workgroup is a collaborating space where you can add members like internal or guest users. These members will be able to browse, create, update or delete files and folders inside the workgroup according to their roles.

BACKGROUND_NO_RESULT.SUBMESSAGE: Try another search or open the search box to find by file types, author or more

BACKGROUND.SUBMESSAGE: Searching for all files and folders inside workgroup
